channel.title: Bot for Trolling!
channel.description:
I found this earlier and it's hilarious. People get so mad.
Link to Script: http://scripts.rsbuddy.com/?script=ContraTroll

item.title: Bot for Trolling!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:29, topic:409510”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=510790.msg3707332#msg3707332 date=1313114202]

lol i just recorded me doin this for 5 mins 2x speed 2 accs… if we can do this… like 2 accs per person… raid varrock square and get those fags who hang around there out, actin all emo, talkin about life thinkin their baws, atention hoars… we should make an attack.

Uploadin 1 sec.

If you want I can edit the main thread to be something like a time for everyone to get 2 or 3 accounts going at varrock.

We can try lol

Ok. Pm me or post here what you want it to say and i’ll add it to the OP. It shall be epic.
[/quote]

Idk but first we would need people who would be willing to participate… but their main accs wouldnt be in danger… because we will tell them to use hotspot shield to use a different ip :P[/quote]

OH SHIT

Read full topic
